# UIUserNotificationActivationMode.background

**Case**

Activate the app and put it in the background. If the app is already in the foreground, it remains in the foreground.

## Declaration

```swift
case background
```

## Constants

- **UIUserNotificationActivationMode.foreground**: Activate the app and put it in the foreground.

items.description: Activate the app and put it in the foreground.
